title: Define System Architecture
description: Design the overall structure and components of the MetabolicOptimizer system.

title: Develop User Registration and Authentication
description: Implement user registration and authentication functionality for the system.

title: Create User Profile and Data Collection Interface
description: Design the user interface for collecting user data such as age, gender, height, weight, activity level, etc.

title: Integrate Metabolic Profile Analysis Module
description: Develop a module that analyzes user input data to generate metabolic profiles.

title: Develop Recommendation Algorithm
description: Create an algorithm that generates personalized nutrition and exercise recommendations based on the user's metabolic profile.

title: Design and Implement Database Structure
description: Create the necessary database tables and structure for storing user data, metabolic profiles, and recommendations.

title: Implement User Interface for Recommendations
description: Design and develop the user interface for displaying nutrition and exercise recommendations.

title: Perform Unit Tests for each Module
description: Write and execute unit tests for all developed modules to ensure they function correctly.
dependencies: Create User Profile and Data Collection Interface

title: Perform System Integration Tests
description: Execute end-to-end tests to ensure all components of the system work seamlessly together.
dependencies: Perform Unit Tests for each Module

title: Document System Design and Implementation
description: Write clear documentation detailing the system design, implementation, and usage.
